text: Echarlens (Dictionnaire-Dikchenéro: Français-Patois/Patê-Franché. Société cantonale des patoisans fribourgeois. Fribourg: 2013. p. 152) is a municipality of the district of Gruyère in the canton of Fribourg in Switzerland. == References == ==Other websites== Category:Municipalities in Gruyère
title: Echarlens
